PMFIDS.title: Project Management Fundamentals for Implementation of Digital Solutions
PMFIDS.description: Introduces essential project management techniques to help learners navigate business transformation initiatives.

modules.title: Project Management Fundamentals, Tools, and Techniques
modules.description: This module is designed to provide you with a comprehensive understanding of project management, project management functions, tools, techniques, and frameworks, and project lifecycle.

modules.title: Budget and Cost Management
modules.description: This module is designed to provide you with a comprehensive understanding of cost management functions, forecasting models, and effective techniques for optimizing project expenses.

modules.title: Project Risk Management
modules.description: This module is designed to deliver an understanding of the types of risks and the process of identifying, analyzing, handling and monitoring risks in managing projects.

ABSTIT.title: Aligning Business Strategy to Technology Innovations and Trends
ABSTIT.description: Focuses on the critical alignment of business strategies with technological innovations and trends, covering methodologies, tools, and crisis management in strategic planning.

modules.title: Aligning Business Strategy to Technology Innovations and Trends
modules.description: This module is designed to provide you with a comprehensive understanding of how to effectively integrate business strategies with emerging technological advancements while also addressing the critical aspect of crisis management.

CM.title: Change Management
CM.description: Provides a thorough understanding of change management principles essential for smooth organizational transitions.

modules.title: Change Management Fundamentals
modules.description: This module aims to provide you with a comprehensive understanding of the principles and practices vital for effectively managing change within organizations.

modules.title: Prepare Approach
modules.description: This module aims to provide you with a comprehensive understanding of the principles and practices vital for effectively managing change within organizations.

modules.title: Manage Change
modules.description: This module aims to provide you with a comprehensive understanding of the principles and practices vital for effectively managing change within organizations.

modules.title: Sustain Change
modules.description: This module aims to provide you with a comprehensive understanding of the principles and practices vital for effectively managing change within organizations.

DCO.title: Digital Customer Onboarding
DCO.description: Emphasizes the importance of digital customer onboarding in enhancing customer experience.

modules.title: Seamless Digital Customer Onboarding
modules.description: This module is designed to explore the diverse approaches to onboarding customers, including traditional branch methods, digital solutions, and the increasingly popular omnichannel approach.

modules.title: New Application and Screening in Onboarding
modules.description: This module is designed to equip you with the essential knowledge and skills needed to navigate the complexities of customer onboarding in compliance with Philippine laws and regulations.

modules.title: Application Approval, Product Issuance, and Feedbacking in Onboarding
modules.description: This course is designed to provide you with a comprehensive understanding of the benefits of automation and self-service solutions, including the key components of automating the recording and monitoring of claimed financial products and the advantages of self-service kiosks in streamlining the product issuance process.

DATAGOV.title: Data Governance of Digital Solutions – From Mapping to Managing the Project
DATAGOV.description: Introduces the concept of data as an asset and the significance of data governance in the digital era.

modules.title: Data Governance of Digital Solutions – From Mapping to Managing the Project
modules.description: This module is designed to provide you with a comprehensive understanding of data governance, including its frameworks, applicability, and trends, as well as how data governance plays a key role in digital transformation.
